name: monetization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of changing something into money, or expressing something as money or currency: the monetization of the national debt The monetization of deficits and debt is generally inconsistent with a fixed exchange rate.
the act of making money from something: the monetization of start-up companies The app holds the promise of limitless growth and monetization potential. See
monetize
More examplesFewer examplesThe country will speed up financial reforms in exchange for debt monetization.The company has also been hinting at its monetization plans.They can advise you about the monetization of your blog.They need to deliver monetization opportunities such as fan clubs and exclusive offers.
